MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH26 postcode area of Penicuik. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:30pm. Our emergency response team is currently onsite replacing fuses and carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will update this message to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:06am on Wednesday, 14 October 2020
